backend/main.mo: Main canister defining bookings, user profiles, admin auth, image paths, service rates, and time slot management with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that removes the old adminCredentials field from persisted actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin auth-flow changes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app and including metadata, fonts, and root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app entry configuring routing, layout, and global admin auth provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Admin table displaying sorted bookings with CSV export capability.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagesEdit: Admin UI for editing hero, service card, and gallery image paths with save functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServiceRat: Form to view and update per-square-foot service rates, loading initial values and submitting updates via hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/TimeSlotsE: Admin UI to toggle availability of booking time slots and save updated slot states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Wrapper that validates admin session, shows a loader or login form, and renders protected content when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginF: Admin login form handling username/password submission, validation, and error display.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Booking form for user consultations with validation, prefill support, time slot filtering, and booking submission.
frontend/src/components/booking/bookingV: Validates booking form fields, returning error messages and a boolean validity flag.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Float: Floating WhatsApp contact button that normalizes the phone number and opens a chat link.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only sticky CTA bar with a button that triggers the booking flow.
frontend/src/components/estimate/Estimat: Live estimate calculator that computes costs or shows inspection-required notices based on area, service, and rates.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Site footer displaying company info, contacts, services, and a powered-by link with the current year.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with branding, account navigation, and click-to-call button using config phone number.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Displays phone, email, and service area contact info using config values.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Renders before/after gallery with optional custom images or defaults.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero banner with background image, headline, and consultation or call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Three-step process section showing booking, site visit, and installation steps.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Review: Shows customer reviews with star ratings and testimonial text.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper with styling variants and scroll-reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Lists service cards with images, descriptions, pricing, and booking actions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Highlights key selling points like pricing, expertise, and timely delivery.
frontend/src/config/ceilingPro.ts: Provides contact configuration including phone, WhatsApp, and email.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: Admin auth context handling login, logout, session validation, and state management.
frontend/src/domain/services.ts: Defines service metadata and helper to resolve service rates with defaults or backend values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Handles admin login, session validation, logout, and error state using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching, creating, and managing bookings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePaths.ts: Fetches and updates image path configuration, applying defaults and handling unauthorized errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: Checks whether the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Provides a ref and visibility state triggered by intersection observer scroll reveal.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRates.ts: Gets and updates service rate values from the backend, with defaults when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeSlotAvailabili: Fetches and updates availability of predefined time slots via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Retrieves and updates the caller’s user profile using backend actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and global typography and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Handles customer authentication via Internet Identity, profile setup, logout, and displays the user's bookings when logged in.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard wrapper showing editors for images, service rates, time slots, and bookings, protected by admin auth with a logout button.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page assembling all marketing sections, image‑driven components, and a scroll‑to booking flow using preselected services.
frontend/src/state/bookingPrefill.ts: Zustand store that tracks a preselected service and provides setters for booking prefill state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing required features, architectural notes, known issues, and current state for the Ceiling Pro website.
